jobInfo.postDescription:
Merchandising Internship

Job Purpose:

The Purpose of this internship is to provide secretarial support and assistance to the Merchandising Team. This position will manage a variety of merchandise related tasks such as: Reports preparation and consolidation, Training material preparation, etc.


Job Responsibilities:

Assist in updating Weekly style-selling report and formulating seasonal SKU Report

Generate and update seasonal collection buybooks

Assist with training material preparation, product knowledge packets translation

Collect and edit seasonal product pictures

Create new arrivals list

Other tasks as assigned from time to time.


Job Requirement:

Bachelor's degree or above, major in Business or fashion management related discipline

Strong interpersonal, organizational and communication skills 

Interest and knowledge in the Fashion Industry 

Good command of Microsoft Office tools (Excel, Power Point)

Ability to work at least 3 days a week preferred (Monday & Tuesday Guarantee)



商品部实习生

职位目标：

协助商品部处理部门各项事宜，确保部门各项工作正常有序进行,包括报表更新，培训材料整理等等工作.

 

职位职责：

负责日常商品部报表更新，数据整理工作

协助每季度商品资料整理

协助整理商品培训材料，翻译货品知识

收集和整理商品部所需的货品图片

新货预览清单

协助部门同事安排的其他事宜


职位要求：

本科或研究生学历在校生，商业或时装管理相关专业

具有较强的独立工作能力以及良好的团队合作精神和沟通

对服装行业感兴趣

熟练使用Microsoft Office软件（Excel, Power Pint）

每周确保至少到岗3天（周一，周二必须到岗）
jobInfo.address: 上海静安区汇智创意1号楼313

brandComInfo.introduce: 传思译奥（上海）商贸有限公司是一家外商独资企业，管理多个奢侈品牌：Thom Browne、AMI、Dries Van Noten、Toteme、Ganni等。目前，公司在全国已80多家直营店，500多名员工。未来，我们的公司规模将不断扩大，直营店将增加至上百家，企业员工近1000人。我们期待您的加入！
